services.name: Personal Website
services.description: A personal website service with responsive design and custom branding. One-time payment with domain name pricing ranging from 50k to 200k per year.
services.message: I am a student or individual looking to showcase my work or portfolio online.

services.name: Company Profile
services.description: A professional company profile website designed for businesses. One-time payment with an annual domain fee (200k-500k) per year and various feature-based add-ons.
services.message: I am a business owner looking to establish an online presence for my company.

services.name: Mobile App
services.description: A mobile application development service for iOS and Android. Built for performance, user-friendly interfaces, and scalable architecture.
services.message: I am a business owner looking to expand my reach and engage with customers through a mobile application.

services.name: Enterprise
services.description: A fully customized solution for both web and mobile applications, tailored to meet unique business requirements.
services.message: I am a business owner looking for a comprehensive digital solution to streamline operations and enhance customer engagement.
